attributes.action: Heartbroken Dad Wants Children in UK
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to allow Seth (8) and Leigh (5)Tutt entry into the UK to live with their father Justin Tutt. Mr Tutts ex-wife committed suicide 6 mths ago in South Africa and the children now live with their elderly grandparents in Kimberley. He has been refused a visa to allow them to live in the UK because of the new rules introduced in July by the current government. These children need their father.
